result.execSummary:
This case has not been concluded. Unless a judgment of conviction is entered, the defendant is presumed innocent of all charges.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

chargeModifiers.descr: PTAC, as a Party to a Crime

result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Damnion Andrell Tucker Sr

records.addlTxt:
Defendant Damnion Andrell Tucker Sr appeared by video, in custody.  Attorney Kerri Terann Cleghorn appeared by video for Damnion Andrell Tucker Sr.  Attorney Jacob Corr for Michael Christopher Schindhelm in court for State of Wisconsin. 
Deputy Court Clerk:  bm 
Status Conference held.  Defense requests a Jury Trial date.
Status conference scheduled for November 21, 2022 at 09:00 am.
Jury trial scheduled for March 13, 2023 at 09:00 am.

Defendant Damnion Andrell Tucker Sr appeared by video, in custody.  Attorney Kerri Terann Cleghorn appeared by video for Damnion Andrell Tucker Sr.  Attorney Jacob Daniel Corr on behalf of Attorney Michael Christopher Schindhelm appeared by video for State of Wisconsin. 

Case in Court for Status hearing with Co-Defendant Case, 22CF38. Discussion placed on the record. Defense reiterated trial posture. State previously advised the Court that cases should be tried together. Court appointed counsel for Co-Defendant Case, 22CF38. Case adjourned for Status hearing, Branch 46. Status hearing scheduled for November 1, 2022 at 08:45 am. Hearing will be held via Zoom Video Conference. Defendant will appear via Zoom Video Conference.

Defendant Damnion Andrell Tucker Sr appeared by video, in custody.  Attorney Kerri Terann Cleghorn appeared by video for Damnion Andrell Tucker Sr.  Attorney William T. Berens on behalf of Attorney Michael Christopher Schindhelm in court for State of Wisconsin. 

Case in Court for Status hearing with Co-Defendant Case, 22CF38. Discussion placed on the record. Defense advised the Court of trial posture. State previously advised the Court that cases should be tried together. Case adjourned for Status hearing, Branch 46. Status hearing scheduled for October 12, 2022 at 08:30 am. Hearing will be held via Zoom Video Conference. Defendant will appear via Zoom Video Conference.

Defendant Damnion Andrell Tucker in Court with Attorney Kerri Terann Cleghorn.  Defendant Damnion Andrell Tucker in custody.   

HELD OFF THE RECORD VIA ZOOM VIDEO CONFERENCE.
Co-Defendant case was rescheduled to September 13, 2022 at 01:30 pm. Attorney Cleghorn advised the Court that she's had difficulties with MSDF producing Mr. Tucker for scheduled zoom meetings. Case adjourned for Status hearing, Branch 46 Status hearing scheduled for September 13, 2022 at 01:30 pm. Hearing will be held via Zoom Video Conference. Defendant will appear via Zoom Video Conference.

Attorney Kerri Terann Cleghorn in court, defendant Damnion Andrell Tucker not in court, in custody. Eric Bashirian on behalf of Michael Christopher Schindhelm appeared for the State of Wisconsin.

**PARTIES APPEARED VIA ZOOM VIDEO CONFERENCE.**
Case in Court for Status hearing with CO-DEFENDANT (Burks 22CF38). Defendant was not produced via Zoom for todays hearing. Discussion placed on the record. Defense received a global a new offer and requested time to discuss offer with Defendant. Case adjourned for Status hearing. Case remains calendared in Branch 46. Status hearing scheduled August 9, 2022 at 9:15 am. Hearing will be held Via Zoom Video Conference.

Defendant Damnion Andrell Tucker in court with attorney Kerri Terann Cleghorn.  Defendant Damnion Andrell Tucker in custody.  Brittany S Kachingwe appeared on behalf of Michael Christopher Schindhelm for the State of Wisconsin.

**PARTIES APPEARED VIA ZOOM VIDEO CONFERENCE.**
Case in Court for Status hearing with CO-DEFENDANT (Burks 22CF38). Discussion placed on the record. Parties negotiating and advised the Court of possible global resolution. Defense requested time to receive and review possible global resolution. Court ordered case adjourned for Status hearing. Case remains calendared in Branch 46. Status hearing scheduled for July 26, 2022 at 11:15 am. Defendant will appear via Zoom Video Conference.

Defendant Damnion Andrell Tucker in Court with Attorney Kerri Terann Cleghorn.  Defendant Damnion Andrell Tucker in custody.  Michael Christopher Schindhelm appeared for the State of Wisconsin.

**PARTIES APPEARED VIA ZOOM VIDEO CONFERENCE.**
Case in Court for Scheduling Conference with CO-DEFENDANTS (Burks 22CF38 and Mann 22CF39). Discussion placed on the record. Defense received discovery material and an offer from the State. Defense requested time to review case with Defendant. Court granted request. Court ordered case adjourned for Status hearing. Case remains calendared in Branch 46. Status hearing scheduled for June 17, 2022 at 08:45 am. Defendant will appear via Zoom Video Conference.

Defendant Damnion Andrell Tucker in court with Attorney Kerri Terann Cleghorn; both appear by video.  Defendant Damnion Andrell Tucker in custody.  Jennifer Tate appeared in person for the State of Wisconsin.  
Preliminary hearing proceeded.  Sworn for the State: MPD Detective. J. Sullivan. State rests.  Defense rests.  Defense motion to dismiss argued and denied. Court found probable cause and bound defendant over for trial.  Original information received and filed;  defendant given a copy, waived reading, was arraigned in open court and plead not guilty.  Case is adjourned to Branch 46.  Scheduling conference scheduled for May 18, 2022 at 11:00 am.

Defendant Damnion Andrell Tucker in Court, in custody.  Owen M Piotrowski Michael Christopher Schindhelm appeared for the State of Wisconsin.
Attorney Thomas Holland Reed appeared for the Public Defender's Office.

**PARTIES APPEARED VIA ZOOM VIDEO CONFERENCE.**
Case in Court for Order to Show Cause hearing. Discussion placed on the record. Public Defender's Office has NOT been able to appoint counsel for Defendant. Statements by Defendant regarding Revocation and Attorney Cleghorn. Public Defender's Office will reach out to Attorney Cleghorn regarding Defendant's pending case. For reasons stated on the record, Court ordered case adjourned for Preliminary hearing. 
Court continued TOLLING OF TIME LIMITS. Preliminary hearing scheduled for March 30, 2022 at 10:00 am. Defendant will appear via Zoom Video Conference from MSDF.

Clerk contacted MSDF to make arrangements for Defendant to appear via Zoom Video Conference for Order to Show Cause hearing scheduled March 21, 2022 at 08:30 am.
Clerk confirmed correct Court date for Preliminary hearing.

Defendant Damnion Andrell Tucker not in court, defendant in custody.  Michael Schindhelm appeared by video for the State of Wisconsin.  
Case set for a preliminary hearing. SPD has not appointed counsel. Court ordered case adjourned for CAUSE for a State V. Lee hearing in the trial court.  Hearing scheduled for March 21, 2022 at 08:30 am.  Preliminary hearing scheduled for March 30, 2022 at 10:00 am.

Defendant Damnion Andrell Tucker in court, in custody.  Michael Schindhelm appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  PARTIES APPEAR BY VIDEO.
Case set for a preliminary hearing. States witness is on call for this matter. SPD has not appointed counsel. Court ordered case adjourned for CAUSE for a Preliminary Hearing in Preliminary Hearing Court, Room 146 of the Criminal Justice Facility.  This hearing will be streamed live on Dacast:  https://iframe.dacast.com/live/4dafbf46-ed15-c11c-fa22-a58262833632/99073afd-37c2-acfa-830d-b1ddcaebf0ea  Preliminary hearing scheduled for March 7, 2022 at 02:30 pm.

Defendant Damnion Andrell Tucker in court, in custody.  Matthew Zisi appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  PARTIES APPEAR BY VIDEO.
Case set for a preliminary hearing. SPD has not appointed counsel. Court ordered case adjourned for CAUSE for a Preliminary Hearing in Preliminary Hearing Court, Room 146 of the Criminal Justice Facility.  This hearing will be streamed live on Dacast:  https://iframe.dacast.com/live/4dafbf46-ed15-c11c-fa22-a58262833632/99073afd-37c2-acfa-830d-b1ddcaebf0ea  Preliminary hearing scheduled for February 24, 2022 at 10:30 am.

TIME CHANGE FOR PRELIMINARY HEARING
Preliminary Hearing scheduled for February 3, 2022 at 10:00  (Defendant at MSDF)
Parties notified via e-mail.

Court ordered defendant TURNED OVER TO Justice Point for SUPERVISION Level 5.  
No possession of dangerous weapons or firearms.

Defendant Damnion Andrell Tucker in court with attorney Katherine Graber.  Defendant Damnion Andrell Tucker in custody.  Anthony J Moore appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Damnion Andrell Tucker appeared by video means with Attorney.  Defendant is advised this case is assigned to Judge Feiss, Branch 46. Defendant given a copy of the complaint and advised of maximum penalties, right to counsel and right to a preliminary hearing.  Court reviewed the complaint and found probable cause to hold the defendant for further proceedings.  DEFENDANT IS INDIGENT AND PUBLIC DEFENDER WILL PROVIDE COUNSEL.  Commissioner advised DNA sample has been obtained from the Defendant.  Court advised Defendant he may qualify to have the DNA sample data expunged if he meets the conditions under Wisconsin Statutes Section 165.77(4).  This hearing will be streamed live on Dacast:  https://iframe.dacast.com/live/4dafbf46-ed15-c11c-fa22-a58262833632/99073afd-37c2-acfa-830d-b1ddcaebf0ea  Preliminary hearing scheduled for February 3, 2022 at 08:30 am.
